thought: I need to implement the httpRequest action to fetch 5 business news headlines from the US using NewsAPI with correct query and header parameters including the API key.
plan: Set method to GET and URL to NewsAPI top-headlines endpoint.
Set query parameters: category=business, country=us, pageSize=5.
Set header parameter for API key using credentials expression.
Test the API call to ensure correct response format.
criticism: Currently, the httpRequest action has no parameters set, so it cannot fetch news. This needs to be fixed to proceed with workflow implementation.

tool_input.comments: Fetch 5 business news headlines from the US using NewsAPI with proper query and header parameters.
TODO: Test the API call and response format
Verify the fetched news count and content
